ProductInfo.Features:
Processor - Intel i7 1600 MHz || Memory Installed - 8192mb DDR3 > Upgradeable to 32768
Hard Drive - 320Gig Serial ATA || Optical Drive - DVD ROM || Screen Size - 15.0" WideScreen LCD
Internet Connection(s) - The installed 802 11 ABGN WI-FI card will allow you to connect to any available wireless network, and the internal Ethernet port will allow a high speed wired connection
Software Installed - NEW Windows 7 Professional 64 Bit, word document & spreadsheet applications, shortcut to Microsofts free virus protection along with a restore partition on the hard drive for easy reinstallation. All software is Genuine!!
What's in the Box? - HP 8540w with NEW pre-installed software, power cord, software registration instructions and a 60 day Warranty
